root.name: Swarm Arena
root.description: OverviewSwarm is a single joystick shooter that can be played using an xbox 360 controller makes use of the LT and RT in order to use abilities.The premise of Swarm Arena is use your orb to collect as many of the swarm as you can and eliminate the enemy with that Swarm.Once you have a suitably sized swarm you then can use one of your many abilities in order to eliminate the enemy orb. The player orb has a radius in which is can collect and influence the swarm, using abilities temporarily reduces the orbs area of influenceThese abilities include:Shoot - Launches your swarm in every direction.Circulate - Swarm circles around the player orb expanding in radius.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows® XP / Vista™ / Windows® 7Processor: 2.0 GHz processorMemory: 1 GB RAMGraphics: 256MB video memory, Pixelshader 2.0DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 200 MBSound: DirectX compatible Sound CardOther Requirements:
